TheWitchHouse.text: You find a banquet laid out in the dining room and feel compelled to sit down and eat. Make a Luck (+0) check and consult the following chart

InnerSanctum.text: Participating in the monthly ceremony, you witness great power and great evil. Lose up to 3 Sanity and gain that many Clue tokens.

SilverTwilightLodge.text: Brushing up against a strange object in the hall, you feel stretched and thin, like your skin is too tight. Pass a Luck (-1) check or you are Cursed.
